data.title: Six-Figure Bitcoin Price Predictions Back on The Table
data.text: The big correction that top analysts had predicted has yet to materialize as Bitcoin prices pushed back towards $40k.

data.title: Ethereum (ETH) In Liquidity Crises As Whales Swallow $3 Billion Worth of ETH
data.text: Ethereum (ETH) price has once again surged 9% on daily charts moving past $1200 levels in another attempt to move past its all-time high. At press time, ETH is trading at $1214 with a market cap of $136 billion.

data.title: Guggenheim's Scott Minerd Stands by His $400,000 Bitcoin Target, but He Has Major Warning
data.text: Guggenheim's Scott Minerd has doubled down on his $400,000 Bitcoin call

data.title: Ethereum price meets imminent barrier above $1,200 as massive correction lingers
data.text: Ethereum recovers tremendously following a recent breakdown to $900, prices rise above $1,200. ETH/USD is dancing in the confines of a rising wedge pattern; a correction seems imminent in the near-term.

data.title: TA: Ethereum Struggles Near $1,250: Why ETH Remains Attractive On Dips
data.text: Ethereum gained bullish momentum above the $1,150 resistance against the US Dollar. ETH price broke the $1.200 resistance, but it struggled to clear the $1,250 level.

data.title: Chainalysis asks: Did Bitcoin fund the Capitol riots?
data.text: A month before a mob stormed the U.S. Capitol building on Jan. 6, an extremist sent $522,000 in bitcoin to nearly two dozen far-right leaders, including white nationalist streamer Nick Fuentes and the Daily Stormer, a Neo-Nazi website, according to blockchain intelligence firm Chainalysis.

data.title: Nigerian Youth Propels the Country to the Top of Google Bitcoin Search Rankings
data.text: Nigeria, one of the biggest cryptocurrency markets in the world, recently emerged as the country with the highest number of bitcoin searches globally, according to Google Trends data. The data shows that the West African country has a search score of 100, which is more than double that of its nearest rival. Youth-Driven Interest According […]

data.title: Block.one's Bitcoin reserves are now worth double the entire EOS market cap
data.text: Block.one holds a reported 140,000 BTC which is worth around double the EOS market cap. Does that make EOS a buy?

data.title: Breaking: Right-Wing Activists Reportedly Received Large Bitcoin (BTC) Before U.S. Capitol Riots
data.text: Just as the U.S. Congress lawmakers are working on impeachment proceedings on U.S. President Donald Trump, there's a sensational revelation coming about last week's riots that took place in the U.S. Capitol. As per an exclusive Yahoo News report, right-wing activists received payments in Bitcoin (BTC) a month before from foreign accounts.

data.title: TA: Bitcoin Revisits $40K, What Are Chances of BTC Hitting New ATH
data.text: Bitcoin price recovered further and surged above the $38,000 resistance against the US Dollar. BTC even spiked above $40,000 and it is likely preparing for more upsides.

data.title: DOT flip: Polkadot overtakes XRP to become the fourth largest cryptocurrency
data.text: DOT is on fire today as it surges up the market cap charts to fourth spot.

data.title: Bitcoin Recovers, Mt. Gox Draft Refund Plan Details Released
data.text: Bitcoin flirts with record highs again Thursday and Mt. Gox releases draft rehabilitation plan details to return funds recovered from the bankrupted crypto exchange.

data.title: Alpha Alarm: The Bitcoin outlook
data.text: This analysis was brought to you by Alpha Alarm, a Substack newsletter featuring daily crypto analysis. The post Alpha Alarm: The Bitcoin outlook appeared first on CryptoSlate.

data.title: Did Grayscale push Bitcoin back up to the $40K mark?
data.text: Some stats indicate Bitcoin's current rally could be more reliant on institutional investors than ever before.

data.title: Bitcoin displays strong technicals for new record high as futures open interest hit $13 billion
data.text: Bitcoin retests $40,000 after recovery almost 30% in two days. Bitcoin open interest increases 74% from the previous month, suggesting high investor optimism.

data.title: Exchanges running out of ETH with reserves plunging 27% in 48 hours
data.text: Analysts predict Ether may soon hit a new all-time high after ETH reserves on centralized exchanges fell by 27% in two days.

data.title: Bitcoin chases new high as analyst says ‘smart money never stopped' buying
data.text: Increasing trading volume and demand from institutional investors have analysts expecting a new all-time high from Bitcoin price.

data.text: Deltec didn't say which clients it's holding Bitcoin for, however.

data.title: Oaktree Capital Chairman Warms up to Crypto — Thankful His Son Owns Enough Bitcoin for the Family
data.text: Oaktree Capital co-founder Howard Marks is warming up to cryptocurrency. Once a crypto skeptic, he now says “thankfully” his son is “quite positive on bitcoin” and “owns a meaningful amount for our family.” Howard Marks Warming up to Crypto Howard Marks, co-founder and co-chairman of Oaktree Capital Management, talked about bitcoin in a memo published […]

data.title: $13B Bitcoin futures open interest reflects traders' strong bullish optimism
data.text: Bitcoin price quickly rallied back to $40,000 but key derivatives indicators show traders are happily flirting with overbought levels.
